name: Grave Digger
description:
This is an hardcore dig & run game filled with monsters exclusively for Android!

How it works: You have to escape from monsters and dig with the shovel as much as you can all around you, to slow down enemies and to trap them. Collect all the stage keys to reach the next level avoiding all obstacles and, again, trying to leave holes everywhere to keep foes away from you!

An old 80s classic is reborn with a revamped graphics and gameplay!
In the shoes of Gaspare, the grave digger, you'll have to escape from hell, exploring dangerous places populated by evil monsters while collecting keys and items to find your way out.
With five diabolic worlds, tons of levels and monsters, the fun is guaranteed!

"If you like the old school side scrolling arcade games of the '80s then you'll definitely enjoy this game." DroidGamers.com

"Recommended if you are after a graphically nice, sedate but challenging game." GameOverApps.com

★ Features ★
- Gorgeous arts and graphics.
- 5 different worlds, 25 diabolic levels.
- Monsters: Zombies, Skeletons, Vampires, Leather-faces, Devils and more!!
- Classic yet very fun gameplay.
- Supports the Xperia™ Play gamepad or Zeemote™ JS-1 Controller.
- Also supports D-Pad or Keyboard (when available), or touchscreen.
- SocialGaming support with Leaderboards and 32 Achievements!!
- NO ADS !!!!!
